ResponseText: This is why I support private retirement accounts... if you start at 18 and retire at 62, you're going to have a lot of money whether you put it in stocks, bonds, or mutual funds. In the end, stocks always go up... usually by large margins. Even in some go sour... automatic sell orders, etc. The old system should still always be an option though. You make good money when they're taking 30%... I would say they do have the right. That'd be over $150,000 income at least...
